Attribute.AttributeName: [Microsoft.ML.CommandLine.Argument(Microsoft.ML.CommandLine.ArgumentType.LastOccurrenceWins, HelpText="Tree fitting gain confidence requirement (should be in the range [0,1) ).", ShortName="gainconf")]

[<Microsoft.ML.CommandLine.Argument(Microsoft.ML.CommandLine.ArgumentType.LastOccurrenceWins, HelpText="Tree fitting gain confidence requirement (should be in the range [0,1) ).", ShortName="gainconf")>]

[Microsoft.ML.CommandLine.Argument(Microsoft.ML.CommandLine.ArgumentType.LastOccurenceWins, HelpText="Tree fitting gain confidence requirement (should be in the range [0,1) ).", ShortName="gainconf")]

[<Microsoft.ML.CommandLine.Argument(Microsoft.ML.CommandLine.ArgumentType.LastOccurenceWins, HelpText="Tree fitting gain confidence requirement (should be in the range [0,1) ).", ShortName="gainconf")>]

Docs.summary: Tree fitting gain confidence requirement. Only consider a gain if its likelihood versus a random choice gain is above this value.
Docs.returns: Value of 0.95 would mean restricting to gains that have less than a 0.05 chance of being generated randomly through choice of a random split. Valid range is [0,1).
